body:
Comment 1: 
Gah, hit 'enter' too soon.  The first image link on
http://blog.golang.org/building-stathat-with-go (  building-stathat-with-go_weather.png
) is not correctly turned into an image link.  The problem with the template is that the
]] is on the following line.  However, just fixing that doesn't still doesn't inline the
image properly.
